Articles.Content: Ok we all know who is the best kerbal (Jeb) but what about his co-pilots. so who is better Bill or Bob tell me your opinion and why?

I like them both for different reasons.

In my imagination, Bill's a steady minded engineer with a decent sense of fun. Bob's a scientist who gets nervous about space-flight, but has a thirst for discovery strong enough to make him sit in that rocket with Jeb, and fly out in hope of finding new things.
In my mind Bob is pretty dumb/oblivious but he's fun. Bill is a stick in the mud. So BOB.

I think I'd prefer to have a beer with Bob.

But I'd rather have Bill in the control seat of my rockets.
I can never tell them apart. I guess they are the same in my mind

Jeb is the crazy Airforce Pilot turned Kerbonaut. According to their personal files Bob is the smartest of the three whereas Bill is the dumbest. Therefore Jeb is the Pilot/Mission commander, Bob is the science specialist, and Bill is the mechanic/service module pilot.

Btw, saying he is the dumbest is like saying Kepler is dumber than Newton and Einstein because he didn't know about Gravity

I like Bob the most. I believe kerbality has driven him to be an kerbalnaut. Poor Bob.

Bob is sometimes even more funnyer than Jebediah, his screams especially.
I think of Bob as paranoid and dumb, while Bill is smart and not as afraid as Bob, but not insane like Jeb.
